frozen.name: gnome-shell-extension-blur-my-shell
frozen.shortDescription: Adds a blur look to different parts of the GNOME Shell, including the top panel, dash and overview.
frozen.longDescription:
Adds a blur look to different parts of the GNOME Shell, including the top panel, dash and overview.

You can support my work by sponsoring me on:
